QuestData.Title: A Legendary Engagement
QuestData.Description: A pleasure, $c.$b$b<Ziradormi smiles.>$b$bIt was kind of you to arrive so quickly.$b$bFor reasons unknown to me, my master seeks audience with you.$b$bI would counsel you not to take this invitation lightly. Anachronos seldom has cause to interact with mortals. Wisdom would dictate that you seek him out in the Caverns of Time at once.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready and I shall personally deliver you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Anachronos in the Caverns of Time.
QuestData.RewardText: It is no whimsical dalliance that brings you here, mortal.$b$bMuster every fiber of your courage for what you are about to behold.
